DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy diclofenac diethylamine 2.32 % gel treatment acute ankle sprain .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Diethylamine 2.32 % Gel Patients With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: Acute sprain ankle Injury within past 48 hour . Pain medication take since injury Pain instability ankle due previous ankle sprain trauma . Ankle sprain due know disease affect ligament Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
